imagesuggestions-notification-message-ar:
Text for an image suggestion notification for an article.

Parameters:
* $1 - article title
* $2 - username, for GENDER support
imagesuggestions-notification-message-se:
Text for an image suggestion notification for a section within an article.

Parameters:
* $1 - section title
* $2 - article title
* $2 - username, for GENDER support
imagesuggestions-notification-message-bu:
Text for a bundle of image suggestion notifications for an article.

Parameters:
* $1 - article title
* $2 - username, for GENDER support
imagesuggestions-notification-bundle-art: Text for an image suggestion for the article itself within a bundle of image suggestions for an article.
imagesuggestions-notification-bundle-sec:
Text for an image suggestion for a section within a bundle of image suggestions for an article.

Parameters:
* $1 - section title
imagesuggestions-notification-link-text-: Label for the primary link to an article that has an image suggestion.
Label for the primary link to an article section that has an image suggestion.
Label for the link to suggested image
Label for the link to on-wiki documentation
